Lunarpines scans were undoubtatly a sip, he couldn't identify it from 
here and since nobody else seemed interested he decided to check it 
out. he returned to the outside when he smelled something familiar. 
another canine scent. (K9) He aproached the new bot cautiously, 
admiring his ship on the way. "Excuse me, you must be new here, nice 
ship."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpines scanner beeps to show another one of the CF's scanners 
in use. he
> continues to scan the odd form in what will one day be Norway.
> 
> "I don't know what you're scanning for but I have to make sure that 
I'm not
> the only one that sees this." The wolfbot sends a link command to 
the other
> scanner to broadcast what he's found.
> 
> (Scans show the arrival of what appears to be three unknown ships 
setting
> down on the ice.)
> .> -----------------------------------------------------------------
----_->
> >
> > ::Firearm::
> >
> > Firearm enters the bridge of the Cybertronian Fire (Necromancer 
presumably
> > following him), going over to one of the scanners. He taps a few 
keys,
> > bringing up Hell Drak's reading when the ship had scanned her 
during their
> > arrival.
> >
> > He presses another button, initiating a planetary scan for her.
> >
> > "It'll pick her up in a little while, then we can run the rescue 
mission,"
> he
> > says, looking at the scanners.
> >
> >
> >
